summary: Simple .INI fix to equip multiple weapons at once.
descriptionHtml:
Simply go to your skyrim.ini file found in Documents/MyGames/SkyrimSpecialEdition,
<br />then under General, add
<br />
<br />
<br />bDisableGearedUp = 0Â 
<br />
<br />
<br />DONE.
Each item marked as a "favorite" will now show up!

The original "Mod" of this can be found here,
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26486/?
For the original version of the game.
author: Hamen
